A process is a program that's running. Process management is like being a conductor of an orchestra - starting programs, stopping them, seeing what each one is doing, and catching any that are acting suspicious!

In this lesson, we'll learn about linux process management and forensics in a way that makes sense. We'll start simple, use real examples, and build your understanding step by step. By the end, you'll understand the core ideas and why they matter!
